TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RichHtmlField extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.WebControls.BaseRichField

Docs.summary: Represents a field control used to edit data in the HtmlField type fields.

remarks.para: Use the RichHtmlField controls in page layouts and on list edit forms to display and modify the item values of any SPListItem.Fields objects of the publishing HtmlField type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new default instance of a RichHtmlField control object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowDragDrop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if the drag and drop of elements is supported for the field.
Docs.value: The default value is true.

remarks.para: When set to false, the image field does not allow users to drag and drop elements into the HTML field.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowEmbedding { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a constraint that enables embedding (IFrames) to be added when editing the field.
Docs.value: true if embedding is allowed; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: When this value is set to true, IFrame embedding is supported for this HTML field by following the HTML field security rules that are specified at the site collection level. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.
Note: Embedding is only supported in fields where RichTextMode is set to FullHtml.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowExternalUrls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows external URLs in the HTML when validating the value in this RichHtmlField object.
Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.para: If this property is set to true, during validation, it sets the property to true and sets the property to the property of the current site collection. This means that only URLs in the HTML that are in the current site collection are accepted as valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontColorsMenu { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if a font colors menu is shown.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontCustomColors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if font custom colors are shown.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFonts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows font element tags to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, <font> element tags are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If you set this flag to false, <font> and <basefont> tags are removed from the HTML. Default is true. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontSizesMenu { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if a font size menu is enabled.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontsMenu { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if a fonts menu is enabled.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontStandardColors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if font standard colors are shown.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontStandardSizes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if font standard sizes are enabled.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowFontThemeColors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if font theme colors are shown.
Docs.value: Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowHeadings { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows heading tags to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, heading tags are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If this flag is set to false, <DIR>, <H1>, <H2>, <H3>, <H4>, <H5>, <H6>, <MARQUEE>, <ADDRESS> and <CENTER> tags are removed from the HTML. Default is true. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowHtmlSourceEditing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether you can switch the HtmlEditor object into a mode where the HTML can be edited directly.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowHyperlinks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows hyperlinks to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, hyperlinks are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If this flag is set to false, <A>, <AREA> and <MAP> tags are removed from the HTML. Default is true. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowImageFormatting { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets image formatting items.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the menus are enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowImagePositioning { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the position of the image.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the menus are enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowImages { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows image tags to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, image tags are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If this flag is set to false, and tags are removed from the HTML. Default is true. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowImageStyles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the Table Styles menu is enabled.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the menu is enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowInsert { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether Insert options are shown.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the insertion of items is enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowLists { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows list tags to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, list tags are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If this flag is set to false, <LI>, <OL>, <UL>, <DD>, <DL>, <DT> and <MENU> tags will removed from the HTML. Default is true. This also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowParagraphFormatting { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether paragraph formatting items are enabled.
Docs.value: Specifies whether menu items are enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowReusableContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the flag that enables the reusable content picker button when editing this field.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowStandardFonts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether standard fonts are enabled.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the menus are enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowStyles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the style menu is enabled.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the style menu is enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowTables { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows table handling tags to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, table handling tags are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If this flag is set to false, <CAPTION>, <COL>, <COLGROUP>, <TABLE>, <TBODY>, <TD>, <TFOOT>, <TH>, <THEAD>, <TR>, <FIELDSET>, <LEGEND> and <HR> tags will removed from the HTML. Default is true. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowTableStyles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the Table Styles menu is enabled.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the menu is enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowTextMarkup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the constraint that allows explicit text markup tags, such as bold and italic, to be added to the HTML.
Docs.value: When this flag is set to false, explicit text markup tags, such as bold and italic, are not allowed in the HTML.

remarks.para: If this flag is set to false, <B>, <EM>, <I>, <STRONG>, <S>, <STRIKE>, <TT>, <ABBR>, <ACRONYM>, <CITE>, <CODE>, <DEL>, <DFN>, <INS>, <SAMP>, <BDO>, <RT>, <RUBY>, <U>, <BIG>, <SMALL>, <SUB>, <SUP>, <PRE>, <PLAINTEXT>, <XMP>, <Q>, <LISTING>, <BLOCKQUOTE>, <NOBR> and <WBR> tags will removed from the HTML. Default is true. This property also determines whether the editing user interface (UI) enables these operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowThemeFonts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether theme fonts are enabled.
Docs.value: Specifies whether the menus are enabled.Returns .

remarks.para: This restriction only disables the menus and does not force the content to adhere to this restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ChildHtmlEditor As HtmlEditor

Docs.summary: Gets the HtmlEditor control used in ControlMode.Edit that allows users to edit the content of this control.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultAssetImageLocation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL to a location in this site collection that will be added to the top of the Look In section of the Asset Picker dialog box when selecting an image source URL.
Docs.value: Defaults to String.Empty.

remarks.para: This URL should begin with either "~SiteCollection/" or "~Site/" followed by the relative URL to the desired Microsoft SharePoint Foundation location. If this URL refers to a valid SharePoint Foundation location and one to which the authoring user has access, the URL is displayed in the Look In section on the left side of the Asset Picker dialog box when it is launched to select an image source URL.

protected: virtual property System::String ^ DefaultTemplateName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the default template name for this control.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableBasicFormattingButtons { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether basic formatting buttons are enabled or disabled.
Docs.value: Set the property to true if you do not want to make basic formatting buttons available.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableCustomStyles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether custom styles are enabled or disabled.
Docs.value: Set this property to true if you do not want custom styles.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color EditorBackgroundColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the HTML Editor control's editing mode background color.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether extensions are enabled for this RichHtmlField object.
Docs.value: If set to false, this property disables user-defined extensions to the HTML Editor, such as extra toolbar buttons and callbacks for the OK button.

protected: virtual property Type ^ ExpectedEditControlClassType { Type ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the expected class of the child control used in Edit mode with this field control.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property ExpectedSPFieldClassType As Type
protected: virtual property Type ^ ExpectedSPFieldClassType { Type ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the expected derived class of the SPField object in the SPListItem object for the FieldName object.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property HasInitialFocus As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> HasInitialFocus { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether this rich text field should have the initial focus.
Docs.value: Specifies that this rich text field should have the initial focus.Returns .

remarks.para: When editing a page, the initial focus should be placed on this HTML editor. The first rich text field that is found in the order specified in the page layout that has this value set to true will get the initial focus when placing the page in edit mode. If no Rich Text field has this value set to true, then the first rich text field on the page will have the focus.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property HiddenInput As HtmlInputHidden

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the hidden input form field where the field stores its data.
Docs.value: Returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Html { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Html As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Html { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current HTML value in the edit control of the field control.
Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the Value property used by the field control framework to get and set the value between the control and the ItemFieldValue interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ItemFieldValue { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property ItemFieldValue As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ ItemFieldValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value that the field will have after the next post back to the page.
Docs.value: The HTML contained in the field.

remarks.para: This override intercepts all reads and writes to the object, allowing the managed navigation logic to replace URLs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinimumEditHeight { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum height that the HTML editor should have when in edit mode.
Docs.value: Specifies the CSS minimum height for this field during edit mode.Returns .

remarks.para: Must include a valid CSS unit.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Validates the content posted to this control.

remarks.para: This method uses an HtmlValidationContext.ValidateHtml method to ensure that the content is safe and to validate that the content meets any constraints specified by the various constraint properties of this control that start with the word "Allow." It also ensures that there is a value if the Field.Required schema property is set to true.
If any "Allow" constraints, violations, or "Required" violations occur, then it sets IsValid to false and its ErrorMessage property to a description of the validation problem.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Value { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Value As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Current string value of the HTML in this field control in Edit mode.
Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.para: This field control framework property is used in the SPControlMode.Edit parameter to get and set the value between the edit controls and the ItemFieldValue property in the SPListItem object.
